name: WWE 2K23: Steiner Row Pack
summary: Get ready to hit that Frankensteiner with the Steiner Row Pack in WWE 2K23. Featuring the franchise debut of The Steiner Bros, along with Hit Row, which includes Top Dolla, Ashante Adonis, and B-Fab as the group’s manager. The Steiner Row Pack is already included in the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.
